events.name: Anode Transition
events.wd_description: As the global transport sector ramps up the transition towards electromobility its anode.

events.name: Lithium Criticality
events.wd_description: In addition, lithium is a very large contributor to the overall criticality of all the cells within the primary material use, demand growth, concentration of reserves, and production categories.

events.name: Cobalt Criticality
events.wd_description: Another value chain identified as critical is cobalt, which displays high criticality in most of the categories (excluding company concentration and price volatility) for all cobalt-containing cells.

events.name: Nickel Criticality
events.wd_description: The material seemingly with the lesser impact to the overall criticality is iron, followed by aluminum.

events.name: Cobalt Demand Growth
events.wd_description: Cobalt demand is increasingly growing, accompanied by a high production share from DRC, a country that scores poorly in most of the indicators.
